org.transitime.utils

Class EmailSender

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.transitime.utils.EmailSender

  • public class EmailSender
extends java.lang.Object
    For programmatically sending out an e-mail. Uses a file specified by Java property transitime.utils.emailConfigFile to configure parameters.
    Author:
    SkiBu Smith

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EmailSender()
      Reads config properties from config file and creates a session that can be used to send e-mails.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      For testing
      void send(java.lang.String recipients, java.lang.String subject, java.lang.String messageBody)
      Sends e-mail to the specified recipients.

      • send

        public void send(java.lang.String recipients,
                 java.lang.String subject,
                 java.lang.String messageBody)
        Sends e-mail to the specified recipients.
        Parameters:
        recipients - Comma separated list of recipient e-mail addresses
        subject - Subject for the e-mail
        messageBody - The body for the e-mail
